codes.title: Verification Codes

empty.title: No verification codes
empty.description: Click the refresh button in the top right to get codes

codes.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all verification codes?

apiConfig.title: API Configuration
apiConfig.label: Cloudflare Worker API URL
apiConfig.description: API URL for fetching verification codes
apiConfig.testSuccess: Connection successful! URL is configured correctly
apiConfig.testFailed: Connection failed, please check the URL

deleteApi.title: Delete API Configuration
deleteApi.label: Delete Cloudflare Worker API URL
deleteApi.description: API URL for clearing all emails (optional)

usage.title: Usage Guide
usage.step1: Enter your Cloudflare Worker API URL in the input field above
usage.step2: Click the "Test Connection" button to verify the URL
usage.step3: Switch to the "Codes" tab and click refresh to get the latest data

apiFormat.title: API Format Requirements
apiFormat.description: Worker API should return one of the following formats:

errors.pleaseConfigureFirst: Please configure Worker URL in settings first
errors.missingFields: Verification code data missing required fields
